Treatment of High-Risk Disease in Children
		                    Treatment of childhood LCH multisystem disease lesions in the spleen, liver, or bone marrow (with or without skin, bone, lymph node, lung, or pituitary gland lesions) may include:         -  Chemotherapy and steroid therapy.
